metadata.title: What If I Want to Set The Limiting Resistance Value?

sections.content:
Question:
What if there is no choice for the limiting resistance (damping resistance) value to be set in Workbench6 and QE for Capacitive Touch?
Answer:
When the resistance value you want to set is smaller than the minimum value
Set to the minimum value.
When the value you want to set is larger than the maximum value
Set to the maximum value. However, charging and discharging may not be possible in time and measurement results may become unstable.
When the resistance value you want to set is between the resistance values of the choices
Select the larger resistance value.
Workbench6 is now in maintenance status, and we do not plan to update it in the future.
Use QE for Capacitive Touch as a support tool for developing a modern capacitive touch sensor.
QE for Capacitive Touch can be downloaded from URL below.
https://www.renesas.com/qe-capacitive-touch
  Suitable Products
RX113
RX130
RX231, RX230
